transcript:
Customer: [Music]
Hello
Executive: Haan sir.
Customer: Wo pata kiya kya bylead wala?
Executive: Haan haan maine wo aapka wo jo tha na uska wo maine jo aapko jo TDS wala jo tha na sir uske liye maine actually hamare record mein ye dikh nahi raha tha. To abhi maine na financial department ke liye iske regarding is tarah se mail escalate kiya hai. To ye sir thoda time lagega ye dekh kar ke ki isme kitna TDS jo tha is wale bill ka hai na baki sabka TDS show kar raha hai jo jo aap bata rahe ho. Bas iska mere ko nahi dikh raha tha. Kyunki isme payment shayad part part mein payment hua tha to iska generate kiya nahi hai in logo ne to ek bar main iske regarding complaint raise kiya hu. Hai na? To waha se jaisa bhi jawab aayega aur jo bhi milega na main aapko share kar dunga na. Thoda rukna padega sir uske liye.
Customer: Par wo ki wo bylead wala?
Executive: Bylead wala acha ye apna ye catalog view wala jo bata rahe hain na?
Customer: Haan.
Executive: Haan sir catalog view wala sir dekhiye jo aapka catalog view hota hai na wo aapke liye hi hota hai personally. Wo aise kisi ko nahi jata hai.
Customer: Nahi jata na?
Executive: Inquiry na na haan haan nahi jata sir wo inquiry aapko inquiries aur dekho inquiry bhi aapka hota hai call bhi unka aapka hota hai catalog view bhi aapka hi hota hai wo bylead mein aapko show karta hai lekin wo aapka hi hota hai aur sir dekhiye buyer jo hota hai na agar man lijiye aapka catalog view kiya to aur bhi logo ko catalog view karta hai to dikhega wo aapko us tarike se lekin ye hai ki aapka jo hai wo aise kahin idhar udhar nahi jayega.
Customer: Nahi nahi wo matlab physically matlab jaise jo share karte ho aap log panch log ko ya jitne bhi log ko aisa karke.
Executive: Wo bylead hi hoti hai wo bylead hi hoti hai sir wo bylead hi hoti hai wo uska logic hi sirf bylead pe chalta hai wo panch logo ko share karne ka bhi piche karan ye hai ki man lijiye agar 50 logo ko hum same lead share karenge na to 50 log aapko call kar lenge. To ye hum isliye nahi karte ki buyer ka experience kharab ho is cheez se ki bhai panch logo ke paas gaya panch logo ne connect haan. Mera concern ye hai ki jo catalog view ko jo bylead bata rahe ho as a bylead aap treat kar rahe ho to mera iska concern ki jo catalog view wali bylead jo mere paas hai ya mere ko dikh rahi hai to kitne log ko matlab share kiya.
Executive: Wo nahi wo share wo share nahi hoti sir waise dekho wo share nahi hoti hai wo catalog view aapka hota hai apna hota hai wo aise kahin share nahi hota.
Customer: Acha acha theek hai.
Executive: Hai na sir haan theek hai theek hai.
Customer: Theek hai.
summary:
Concerns:

- TDS amount not reflecting in records.

- Enquired about catalog view being shared.



Resolution:

- Escalated TDS issue to the finance department.

- Clarified catalog view is not shared with others.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will share updates on TDS issue.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Annoyed -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- tds, catalog view, buylead, payment
